thread.title: Moonlight wins Oscar for Best Picture after La La Land mistakenly named as winner
thread.title_full: Moonlight wins Oscar for Best Picture after La La Land mistakenly named as winner

author: Telegraph Video
title: Moonlight wins Oscar for Best Picture after La La Land mistakenly named as winner
text:
Moonlight wins Oscar for Best Picture after La La Land mistakenly named as winner Watch | Moonlight wins Best Picture after La La Land mistakenly named winner 02:06 Telegraph Video , video source APTN 27 February 2017 â€¢ 6:34am 
T here was confusion and controversy at the Oscars as Moonlight won the best picture award after La La Land was mistakenly announced as the winner. 
The producers of the musical were already concluding their speeches when it was revealed there had been a mix-up and Moonlight had in fact scored the top prize of the night.
